price: 69. Diles (¡oh, Muhammad!): “Quienes inventan mentiras contra Al-lah no triunfarán”.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَفۡتَرُونَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡكَذِبَ لَا يُفۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: qul inna alladhīna yaftarūna ʿalā al-lahi al-kadhiba lā yuf'liḥūna
